DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : At least 18 year age United States time consent Physiciandiagnosed migraine without aura At least two maximum 8 moderate severe migraine attack 30 day prior screen Initial triptan prescription 3 month ( ± 2 week ) prior identify eligible study , triptannaïve initial prescription Used triptan medication least within 6 month prior date informed consent screen Internet access able complete online survey via electronic data entry Exclusion criterion : Treated triptans prior study In active litigation compensation issue include disability dispute case Government agency Participation clinical trial within last 90 day
